-1.Author: Albert
-1.quotes: a stich in time saves nine

-2.Author: Adeout
-2.quotes: a tsdjktdku in time saves nine

-4.Author: Nelson Mandela
-4.quotes: “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”

-5.Author: Nelson Mandela
-5.quotes: “When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw.

-6.Author: Mavin Gaye
-6.quotes: Marriage is miserable unless you find the right person that is your soulmate and that takes a lot of looking.

-7.Author: Winston Churchill
-7.quotes: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.

-8.Author: Emily Dickinson
-8.quotes: How strange that nature does not knock, and yet does not intrude!

-10.Author: Steve Wozniak
-10.quotes: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.

-11.Author: Walt Disney
-11.quotes: “The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

-12.Author: Will Rogers
-12.quotes: “Don't let yesterday take too much of today

-13.Author: Vince Lombardi
-13.quotes: “Its not whether you get knocked down, its whether you get up

-14.Author: Dr. Henry Link
-14.quotes: “We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by actions

-15.Author: John Wooden
-15.quotes: “Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out

-16.Author: Stephen Hawking
-16.quotes: “However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at

-17.Author: Mark Twain
-17.quotes: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started

-18.Author: Kurt Cobain
-18.quotes: “If opportunity doesn't knock, build the door

-19.Author: Albert Einstein
-19.quotes: “In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.

-20.Author: John Wooden
-20.quotes: “Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.

-1100.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
-1100.quotes: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent

-1200.Author: Socrates
-1200.quotes: The only true wisdow is in knowing you know nothing
